pr_title: Refactor native image config to avoid warnings

timeline.message: Refactor native image config to avoid warnings

timeline.author: ilopmar

replies.bodyText: if the file is named reflect-config.json it is automatically picked up. We were only generating this file to load our inconsistently named reflection-config.json file
replies.author: graemerocher

replies.bodyText:
You are right. Then I think you can rename REFLECTION_CONFIG_JSON to REFLECT_CONFIG_JSON here https://github.com/micronaut-projects/micronaut-core/pull/4541/files#diff-a6f6eed2d556fc4571d32b10ec2a16d17cb98075c9e1b3ae0395176281cbb061R73
For the rest of the changes, everything looks good.
replies.author: ilopmar
